alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Rawlins; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Thomas, southeastern Rawlins and west central Decatur Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Gem, or 14 miles northeast of Colby, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Thomas, southeastern Rawlins and west central Decatur Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
